verses.verse: Now the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? <S%H3045>Tell<s%> us <S%H4100>how<s%> we shall <S%H7971>send<s%> it to its <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> do not <S%H7971>send<s%> it <S%H7387>empty;<s%> but you shall <S%H7725>surely<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to Him a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> you shall be <S%H7495>healed<s%> and it shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to you <S%H4100>why<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H5493>removed<s%> from you."

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall be the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to Him?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2568>"Five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H9425>tumors<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice<s%> [according to] the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4046>plague<s%> was on <S%H3605>all<s%> of you and on your <S%H5633>lords.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6754>likenesses<s%> of your <S%H9425>tumors<s%> and <S%H6754>likenesses<s%> of your <S%H5909>mice<s%> that <S%H7843>ravage<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> He will <S%H7043>ease<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> from you, your <S%H430>gods,<s%> and your <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> then do you <S%H3513>harden<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> as the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%>? <S%H9201>When<s%> He had <S%H9412>severely<s%> <S%H9412>dealt<s%> with them, did they not allow the people to <S%H7971>go,<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed<s%>?

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> and <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> there has <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5927>been<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke;<s%> and <S%H631>hitch<s%> the <S%H6510>cows<s%> to the <S%H5699>cart<s%> and <S%H7725>take<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> <S%H310>away<s%> from them.

"And <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5414>place<s%> it on the <S%H5699>cart;<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to Him as a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> in a <S%H712>box<s%> by its <S%H6654>side.<s%> Then <S%H7971>send<s%> it <S%H7971>away<s%> that it may <S%H1980>go.<s%>

"And <S%H7200>watch,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H5927>goes<s%> up by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of its own <S%H1366>territory<s%> to Beth-shemesh, then He has <S%H6213>done<s%> us <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>evil.<s%> But <S%H518>if<s%> not, then we shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that it was not His <S%H3027>hand<s%> that <S%H5060>struck<s%> us; it <S%H1961>happened<s%> to us by <S%H4745>chance.<s%>"

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> and <S%H631>hitched<s%> them to the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H3607>shut<s%> up their <S%H1121>calves<s%> at <S%H1004>home.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and the <S%H712>box<s%> with the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice<s%> and the <S%H6754>likenesses<s%> of their <S%H2914>tumors.<s%>

And the <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H3474>took<s%> the <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H1870>direction<s%> of Beth-shemesh; they <S%H1980>went<s%> along the <S%H4546>highway,<s%> <S%H1600>lowing<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and did not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%> And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> them to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Beth-shemesh.

Now [the people of] Beth-shemesh were <S%H7114>reaping<s%> their <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and they <S%H5375>raised<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and were <S%H8055>glad<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> [it.]

And the <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the Beth-shemite and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> [was] a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stone;<s%> and they <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5699>cart<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H6510>cows<s%> as a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3381>took<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H712>box<s%> that was with it, in <S%H834>which<s%> were the <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stone;<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
And when the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914>tumors<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for <S%H6138>Ekron;<s%>

and the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice,<s%> [according] to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> belonging to the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> of <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and of <S%H6521>country<s%> <S%H9219>villages.<s%> The <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5117>set<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [is a witness] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the Beth-shemite.

And He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> some of the <S%H376>men<s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H7200>looked<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> 50070 <S%H376>men,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? And to <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall He <S%H5927>go<s%> up from us?"

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Kiriath-jearim, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H5927>take<s%> it up to you."
